author: John Griffin
text: 'Love the Chipotle cheese steak. Hyper reliable. Fast. No mistakes.'

author: Alex Suero
text: 'Their cajun fries are amazing.'

author: Jagger Doll
text: "I'm from Philly
column5: it's nice to get a good cheesesteak around here. Really can't beat the prices"

author: Ricky Fontaine
text: 'Good food'

author: Carey K
text: 'I‚Äôm really surprised that people enjoy their food. My order was pretty bad. The cheesesteaks were so tiny
column5: about the size of my wrist. I asked for extra cheese and barely got any cheese at all. It was bland and greasy. Onion rings and Cajun fries were okay
column6: but again
column7: bland. I definitely DO NOT recommend!'

author: Michael Quinlan
text: "Excellent food and quick service.  I'd definitely go back again."

author: Elyk Ayaub
text: 'Good eats with no frills and fast service! Will come here again when I‚Äôm in the area'

author: Miguel Ortiz
text: "Food is good that's the only reason they are getting three stars I ordered through Uber eats they forgot an item I give them a call guy says not my problem call under eats and hangs up very professional"

author: Jairo Galindo
text: 'Delicious!'

author: Lauren Tonsil
text: "The best cheesesteak I've had.......and I used to live in Philly."

author: hardik senjaliya
text: 'Probably the just wings I‚Äôve ever ate!! As well as Chicken Diablo Sandwich
column5: bread was really fresh and soft!! Highly recommend this place!!'

author: jay g
text: 'Good food and fast service üëå'

author: Tom
text: 'I\'ve ordered delivery from here many times before
column5: the food is great
column6: zero complaints. Today I ordered on grubhub
column7: didn\'t pay attention to my ETA whatsoever as I\'m in no rush to get my food
column8: and the restaurant called me. The guy I spoke to was extremely apologetic
column9: says they\'re running a little behind
column10: it could be 20-25 minutes late. "This is a once a year kind of situation." I was like dude that\'s absolutely fine with me
column11: doesn\'t matter at all... But the fact that they\'d call about such a minor delay
column12: the attitude it takes to value your customers\' time enough to make them aware of a little longer lead time? That shows great management and a good culture at the restaurant. If you go here
column13: you can know they absolutely care about you and giving you the best experience. Thanks a lot

author: justin mccleave
text: 'Good food good people'

author: alFredo Romero
text: 'Nj best philly'

author: MrMoneyHungry3
text: 'Horrible customer service.'

author: Genevieve Belhamidi
text: 'Cashier/cook extremely Not in a good mood.  Soggy chicken and the saltiest fries I‚Äôve ever had.'

author: Jermaine Elliott
text: 'This spot here is special to me
column5: very clean nice place to eat in or outdoor. Very nice respectable
column6: . Cheese steak restaurant.'

author: Remo Spruengli
text: 'The worst place in Hoboken! Do not ever order or go there! I just had an employee of theirs delivery a Philly Cheesesteak to me and the guy started to curse me out up front at my house! Do me a favor and boycott this place!'

author: Frank Frattolillio
text: 'Also love their wings'

author: Mitchell McLaughlin
text: 'Sat there for 25 mins as my food was sitting there but they said it wasn‚Äôt ready. Just getting cold in the window'

author: Jeremy Hernandez
text: 'Yessir'

author: Edward Mcnamara
text: 'Food is amazing been a customer for approx 9 years and it‚Äôs sad to say that the service is just getting worse and worse. Today was the worse encounter yet
column5: took a customer before me after I was there
column6: was very rude. Not sure but the servers name on my receipt was ‚ÄúJinesh‚Äù. Hope the hospitality changes.'

author: Rashad Moore
text: 'Their cheese steak and chicken sandwiches are good!'

author: John O'Kean
text: 'Great spot. Gotta get the Chipotle Cheesesteak. Trust me. Great guys working there'

author: Jeannette Calle
text: "Ordered 15 mild wings and fries. The wings were overcooked and very salty. Maybe it's because it was close to closing and the oil was old. The mild sauce was good. The fries are alright. Might have to stick to wings to go."

author: Kenye Askew
text: "So good! I can't sing their praises enough. I've had all the famous and local philly cheesesteak spots in Philly and they can't touch this spot. The chipotle cheesesteak is amazing and so are the cajun fries. Recently moved from NJ to NYC and I really miss this place. A must have!"

author: C G
text: 'Tasteless ‚Äúcheesesteaks‚Äù I honestly don‚Äôt understand the good reviews. Literally tasted like nothing it was weird. The only good thing I had from my order was the fries. Other than that they need to add some seasoning on their meat or something because that was super disappointing to have something look appetizing
column5: but be the complete opposite.'

author: S ‚ÄúChanch‚Äù C
text: 'Good food. Horrible delivery experience. Took over an hour for my food to arrive'

author: The Leopard
text: 'Been looking for a decent cheesesteak  since I moved here From PA 4 years ago
column5: finally found one'

author: Butta Sahdeez
text: 'Great food Great service'

author: RK Yoo
text: 'Ordered contactless delivery and it was good. The Philly cheese steaks have a lot of meat and everything was fresh. Fries were still hot and delicious when arrived. Wings were just okay and chicken philly was a little bland. Still
column5: would order again as portions are big and fast delivery.'

author: Saley Maiga
text: 'Manager had no mask on and was talking and spitting all over the place while taking orders. Food was tasteless and bread was not fresh at all. You know that bread that you leave sitting there for like 2 days....save your money and go eat somewhere else.'

author: Brooke Roderick
text: "The food is soooo good. Everything I've tried from here has been delicious."

author: Jared McGinley
text: 'Soggy onion rings
column5: almost no cheese on my cheese steak and rude service. Stay away'

author: Lauren Benio
text: '5 stars! Nothing fancy but exactly what you want for a cheesesteak place. Large selection of Steaka and different cheese to order! Prices are super affordable. Food is good quality. Definetly fixed the craving for a good cheesesteak!'

author: S Adkins
text: "I can't speak for the quality of the food considering the delivery never arrived!! I called the store and asked for an update and he said that I never answered the door which is funny because I was outside on the porch during the delivery window AND never received a call. I offered to pay an additional delivery fee just to receive the food and was told this wasn't an option. No refund
column5: no food
column6: waste of $20!"

author: Celeste Perlez
text: 'I would give this place zero stars if I could. First
column5: after placing my order
column6: the man at the register who had glasses was going to fry up some fries. There is a trash can right next to the fryer. He placed the basket on TOP of the trash can filled to the top with trash
column7: filled the basket up with fries
column8: and then placed it in the fryer. Completely unsanitary!!!!!!!!! I ordered a chicken Parmesan sandwich and when I got home to eat it
column9: a disgusted reek filled my apartment! The Parmesan cheese smelled spoilt and I was too grossed out to eat it. This place doesn‚Äôt care about being sanitary OR giving quality good food to their customers. I am never ordering from here again. Complete waste of my money!'

author: Brittany Twist
text: 'Philly eggroll is to die for!'

author: Mehdi Nahro
text: 'Good Philly cheese steak sandwiches lots of options
column5: the only reason for missing an extra star is because the sandwiches keep on getting smaller and smaller.'

author: Morgan Wilson
text: 'Love it'

author: Melly H
text: 'The sandwich was too greasy and so were the fries. I practically made a juice with all the grease coming out of both the sandwich and fries.'

author: La Moula
text: 'Gross and horrible customer service'

author: Jachin Deck
text: 'Hands down one of the best cheesesteaks I‚Äôve ever had! And I‚Äôve been to Philly several times and had cheesesteaks there.'

author: Jagger Sheppard
text: 'I constantly come by grabbing some food in here. I enjoyed the prompt customer service and well prepared dishes. I recommend this place.'

author: Jason F
text: 'Great for a quick bite. Quality ingredients
column5: price and service. One of the best cheesesteaks in Hoboken'

author: Hazel Chinique
text: 'Open very late
column5: and they serve a good variety of cheesesteaks. I recommend
column6: especially to local college students'

author: rus tudor
text: 'Try swapping out your bread for garlic bread. You will not regret it!'

author: Oreill Henry
text: 'Really poor customer service. The food is okay. It would be better to eat at one of the neighboring restaurants IMO.'

author: Andrew
text: "Good for some late night Philly cheese steaks. I'm sure they're great during the day as well."

author: David Orr
text: 'Best place for a Philly cheesesteak in Hoboken. The fries are really good
column5: Cajun fries or cheese fries.'

author: Tauken Yerkinuly
text: 'Meat quality is 3 out of 10. Service even worse!  Owner of the place was very rude and not nice. Don‚Äôt recommend eating here.'

author: Ofly money
text: 'One of the best cheesesteaks out here.'

author: Patrick McFadden
text: 'Good philly cheesesteaks. I had the california cheesesteak which has lettuce
column5: tomato
column6: raw onions
column7: cheese and steak. It was a huge portion. The hot sauce they have there is great too.'

author: F. Valdez
text: 'California Chicken was cold
column5: pre-done and served after.'

author: Nicholas Tomaselli
text: 'The best Philly cheese steaks I\'ve ever had. Never disappoints. I have been to both the "original" philly cheese restaurants in Philadelphia (Pat\'s and Geno\'s) and others around the country and this place is better. Midtown Philly Steaks is also consistent
column5: as I have been having cheese steaks here for over three years and they have never disappointed. I cannot speak for their other food
column6: but the beef cheesesteaks are absolutely wonderful and I will be eating them as long as I\'m able. I would reccomend the Diablo cheesesteak

author: K Patel
text: 'The best ever food... Anytime ...anyday...Period.. Reasonable price..good quantity...excellent food quality...amazing customer service...and you must have to try the Cajun fries'

author: Robert Glenn
text: 'Great cheesesteaks and great options for
column5: with plenty of good side items. Great for a quick bite.'

author: BOBBY WARREN
text: 'Yuck.. Late night food place for. The drunk young adults on Washington ave.. Will not be back. Not real cheesecakes either. More or less like the ones you buy in a box from shop rite..'

author: Denise Wong
text: 'This is a miss for me. The bread was light but gummy. I ordered the "Philly" cheese steak with Provolone. I was told onions and peppers would be extra but not how much extra. They just repeat "It comes with nothing."  The printed menu doesn\'t say how much adding onions and peppers would be either so I just declined. When I got back to the office a block away
column5: my "provolone" was super yellow and gushy like whiz. Plus I got onions anyway I guess. They probably gave me someone else\'s order. The Cajun fries were good at least.'

author: Kevin Ihnen
text: "Well first off
column5: the Diablo sub was just hella banging... However
column6: I may have be a bit biased
column8: who is also a former Marine
column9: and helped me out in a moment of minimal distress. Thanks again Ryan! I'll be back for another sub!"

author: Rafael Reynoso
text: 'Is very good'

author: Janam Patel
text: 'Best cheesesteaks in town and service is fast and friendly'

author: Sara Walker
text: 'Delicious !'

author: B N
text: 'greasy sandwiches which you start feeling bad in stomach when you start eating. i only could eat quarter of it and throw it out when i start feeling a bit of sick'

author: Jordan Urbaczek
text: "Amazing cheese steaks! Must try: Chipotle cheese steak and cajun fries. If you want something really spicy
column5: go for the Diablo. If you want something mild
column6: go for the garlic mozzarella. Whatever you get it's going to be good."

author: Scott Lamond
text: 'Just parked outside'

author: Ronald Besser
text: 'Good simulation of the real deal from the city of brotherly love. The details are correct
column5: down to having the option of "wit whiz." Expansive (but not expensive) menu beyond the steaks
column6: and good quality in everything we tried.'

author: Samantha Mackay
text: "Customer service was good. Young man (Emanuel) was very nice. When did they start charging a $1.00 for flats only? I've been to several locations in the past (including this one)
column5: and have NEVER been charged extra for flats only."

author: Samuel Nieves
text: 'Good'

author: Marko Djapic
text: "Strong no for me. Honestly all the ingredients are low quality and I would forgive it more if it was cheaper. Service is good but how do you serve this food with a straight face? Stevens kids will swear by it
column5: not gonna lie its probably a lot better if you've imbibed heavily before hand
column6: but I came here sober
column7: so take this all with  grain of salt."

author: Wanda Velentin
text: "You've gotta try it"

author: Jerry Norris
text: 'Quick and fast gotta get the Cajun fries'

author: Abderrahim Rhazi
text: 'Good fast food'

author: Joshua T Howard
text: 'Excellent menu
column5: with tons of choices of different sandwiches. Even veggie friendly!'

author: Nick Lenzi
text: 'Went to school in Philadelphia and this place does the trick when I get a craving for a decent Philly cheesesteak. They have the fries and the roll you would get at a legit place in Philadelphia. Worth checking out if you want a taste of Philadelphia.'

author: Marc Garcia
text: 'The "steak" had the texture of ground beef. There was not enough cheese. The entire sandwich was smaller than a typical cheesesteak for the same price. The beef was bland and seemed to be unseasoned. However the fries were good and the staff was friendly. But for a place with "steaks" in the name
column5: I was very disappointed. Hopefully they switch to better quality meat in the future. And add more cheese. And a larger bun.'

author: Rebecca Spirer
text: 'Reasonably priced for really good food. Mozzarella sticks are amazing as well as ffries. All cheese steaks are good.'

author: Dhananjay Salgaocar
text: "It was really good. I got the Chipotle cheese steak and it was the best cheese steak I've eaten. And I've been to Philly a lot. Knocking off a star for the service. Could've been a bit better."

author: Jimmy Katayama
text: 'Good food!!'

author: Alex Clower
text: "I like their steak sandwiches but I don't like cheese. I always order the same thing. One with cheese for my wife and one without. When i get them home
column5: 3 out of 5 times
column6: I got both with cheese. Shouldn't be that difficult to get it right.  Aside from that
column7: their sandwiches are good and the service is prompt but not always accurate."

author: Matt Kandl
text: 'Great food! Quick and always good. Cajun fries are awesome.'

author: Frank V
text:
'Amazing period.

Best cheesesteak I have had in my life including pats Gino‚Äôs and others in Philly.

Feel in love with this place when I was in college.

Two best cheesesteaks are the buffalo chicken and the California streak lettuce onions etc.

1 con sometimes they will overcharge very drunk people.'

author: Myrna Mera
text: 'The best philly steaks'

author: Mike Porter
text: 'Just not a very cheese steak.'

author: Amanda Martinez
text: 'The California Cheese Steak is AMAZBALLS!!!'

author: Walter Zielenski
text: "It's not a bad quick bite
column5: but it's not a beautiful sandwich. 10/10
column6: would recommend for a night you plan on spending home alone watching Netflix
column7: wondering why you didn't make better plans with your friends."

author: Sergio Scardigno
text: "It's aight. Lots of lettuce
column5: not a lot of meat. Rolls are aight.\n\nEdit for a reply to Midtown: I got the California Chicken sandwich - an item you serve that comes with lettuce. There was a lot of it
column6: and very little chicken
column8: and my grandparents used to own Sasso's Deli
column9: and we always got fresh bread from Rockland Bakery. I know what good bread is
column10: I'm offended you would even call that into question. And we certainly put more meat (quality meat
column11: too) on our sandwiches when we owned the place. Take notes."

author: Joshua Linguine
text: "I walked into Midtown Philly on a cold winter's night whilst craving some late night munchies. It was 10 minutes before closing time. Some meanie from earlier that night had ordered 4 cheesesteaks and never picked them up. My man Jinesh offered to give them to me all 4 for only the price of 2 cheesteaks. It blew my flippin' mind. I ate 2 of them that very night
column5: gave one to my good friend Soup as a favor for accompanying me on my quest
column6: and had one for a delicious breakfast in the morning. Easily one of the best nights of my life.\nAnother time I was on a date with a fine lady
column7: and took her to none else but Midtown. As we were making small chatter
column8: talking about our hopes and dreams
column9: one of the other workers (I forgot his name) gave us a complementary order of Cajun fries. We're not dating anymore
column10: but god damn those Cajun fries were tasty.\nIt's the generosity of people like Jinesh and the other employees of Midtown that make the world go round. Their cheesesteak sandwiches
column11: AKA ambrosial meat and cheese generously stuffed between the supple loaves of fresh bread
column12: absent of lettuce (as a cheesteak should be)
column13: are a must have for any Hoboken native. Midtown is not only LGBT+ friendly
column14: but Wizard friendly! Even to wizards who are quite powerful and have a fixation for Gatorade."

author: Ben Thomson
text: 'Great food any time of day! Always soft and fresh warm bread with a perfect meat:lettuce ratio (if you ask for lettuce). Delicious and perfect portion size!!'

author: Alex Massenzio
text: 'One of the best places to get late night food in Hoboken.'

author: Robert Frusina
text: 'Best cheesesteaks outside of Philly'

author: John
text: "The Cajun fries are really good. They are always freshly made on the spot. I ordered a Philly cheese-stake and to be honest
column5: it was alright. I've really had better. I also ordered a chicken sandwich and that was far better than the other one. Though this is a good place to eat fries
column6: would highly recommend it."

author: Owen Spangler
text: "The cheese steaks we're pretty good
column5: and there was a pretty good variety on the menu to choose from. They forgot cheese on my cheese fries
column6: but really that's no big deal. Decent amount of outdoor seating as well."

author: Teresa Burger
text: 'We are from Chicago and you cant get a philly this good at all. I love Philly steak and This is SLAP YOUR MOMMA GOOD!!!!!!!!!!THE GUYS THERE ARE VERY NICE AND PLACE WAS CLEAN GREAT GAST SERVIVE .....WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PLACE.'

author: Anas Najmeddine
text: 'The best order processing
column5: Jalapeno cheese fries
column6: and cheeses teak'

author: Dennis Leon
text: 'Not bad. There are various varieties of sandwiches and they can be tailored to your taste.'

author: R Patel
text: 'Great fast food for all palette.'

author: Israel Rodriguez
text: 'Great service and food..  A+'

author: B Romo
text: 'Good cheese steak!  A little light on the meat but still very good!  Pretty good fries too!'

author: Andrew Price
text: 'This is fast food
column5: but my wife and I really love the Chipotle Cheesestake.'

author: Philip Trageser
text: 'Solid cheese steaks.  They get the bread right!'

author: x7tony8x
text: "The food is delicious but the staff is incredibly and ridiculously rude to unfathomable levels. They get nasty with the customer because they can barely speak English and have a hard time understanding your order so they get nasty with you like it's your fault. My wife was ordering food for us and has to repeat the order to three different men and the third told her to hurry up because she was ordering to slow .she ordered at a nice reasonable pace due to the previous two on the phone not understanding her and getting frustrated. Hire some staff that speak and understand decent English if you are going to treat customers this way due to language barriers!!!"

author: MD Rahaman
text: "GREAT STEAK.. ALTHOUGH WE DID GET 5 TO 6 STEAK WHEN WE WERE THERE THEY WOULDN'T GIVE OUT A RANCH SAUCE AS COURTESY THEY WANTED TO CHARGE FOR IT WHEN WE ASKED .."

author: John Shamburg
text: 'A bit pricy for a quick bite
column5: IMO
column6: but good cheesesteak.'

author: L
text: 'Easily the best cheesesteak in the area.'

author: Vik Murillo
text: 'Not what I remembered it to be but good for the late night munchies'

author: Steven Dakak
text: 'Best cheesesteaks around!  I drive a half hour just to get them from here. Good variety of choices. And the cheese fries are amazing!'

author: Roberto Cortes
text: 'Pretty good cheese steaks.'

author: Louis Ploth
text: 'Absolutely horrible! We are regulars there and we accidentally gave them the wrong address honest mistake. The owner then calls me up and was very rude. He refused to deliver the food. He told me if i want my food i will have to go to him to get it. Safe to say i will never go back to the place ever! After all the business we gave him I‚Äôm am shocked. There are places in Hoboken with much better food!'

author: Kathynel Hatten
text: 'Thoroughly enjoyed the foodüçΩ'

author: Corey Barnwell
text: 'Go to cheese steak place for me'

author: Sozan Girgis
text: 'I liked'

author: David Sevilla
text: 'Tasty and convenient
column5: would recommend for anyone who wants a quick bite.'

author: Jiaren Li
text: 'As far as expectation vs. reality goes this place offers exactly what it says on the tin and for great values. Recommend for quick bites or to satisfy some cravings'

author: Karol Niezgodzki
text: 'Ordered and after 3 hours called again to ask where is delivery! I was apologized and promised that within 30 min I will receive my order - passed already 1 hr and nobody is responding my calls. 4 hours lead time and still not here!!!! Shame on you Philly Steaks!!!!!'

author: Christian Rojas
text: 'Amin is A1'

author: Agnes Velasquez
text: 'Beautiful place\nReally nice staff\nA nice date night idea'

author: Joe
text: 'I like this place
column5: but the cheese steaks are bland which is incredibly disappointing.'

author: Charles Bryant
text: "Horrible the am Cheesteak was so bland it  doesn't even look like steak more like boiled ground beef the fries are cooked way to long and taste oily but back to bland ass cheesteak like really disgusting I almost vomited trying to finish a terrible terrible terrible I guess there's no place to get a good cheesesteak in Northern New Jersey"

author: Rawad Shaheen
text: 'I love to order from them only a because of their delivery guy his name is shareef this guy represents this restaurant in amazing way .'

author: Rick Perrine
text: 'Midtown is great. The selection of  specialty cheese-steaks is great
column5: and they are open late
column6: which is always a bonus. Depending on the time of day and your mood
column7: you certainly need to be in the mood for a cheese-steak. All in all
column8: I highly recommend. That being said
column9: their delivery can be delayed sometimes.'

author: Kevin Sofronas
text: 'Inexpensive
column5: fast
column6: and tasty. Perfect for anyone on a budget.'

author: Meyer Advertising
text: 'Very good cheesesteak . Ordered the pizza steak and some lemon pepper fries. Got exactly what I wanted and the service was fantastic. If any negative it was the fountain drink was miniature but at least they offer free refills .'

author: Francisco Companioni
text: 'Legit steak sandwiches
column5: and the variations are also delicious'

author: Richard Cunningham
text: "I have ordered pretty regularly from these guys in the past. I like the food. Tonight the delivery guy turned up with a dollar change and stiffed me on the tip. No apology
column5: he thought it was funny. Walked off with 30%. So that will be the last time I order. Hope his employer thinks it funny because I'm not laughing."

author: Tobias Noll
text: "The food here is really good
column5: and some things are very unique. The combinations here also don't sound like they would work (For example
column6: the pizza cheese steak) but they taste very good
column7: so feel free go go a little outside your comfort zone
column9: and I haven't been disappointed.\nPrices are quite good as well
column10: I'm always filled up for around $10. In Hoboken
column12: maybe a bit cheaper.\nOne warning though: if something sounds spicy
column14: and it is probably twice as spicy as it sounds. Don't worry though
column15: it always tastes good.\nDelivery can be take a bit of time
column16: but they don't advertise 30 minute delivery to my knowledge
column17: so I don't hold it against them. The food arrives hot
column18: so no complaints there. It generally arrives in around 45 minutes for me. The delivery drivers have been rude at times
column19: but I'm not paying for a smile
column21: so I don't mind much.\nThe quality is hit or miss though
column22: sometimes  (Very infrequently) I find that the food is really greasy
column23: but other times (Most of the time)  it's perfectly fine. If they could get that worked out
column24: I would definitely give it full marks."

author: Angel Patel
text: 'Best food ever'

author: Ryan Shore
text: 'Great late night food. Try the chicken Hawaiian.'

author: Rebecca Juras
text: 'Great low carbs option
column5: although a little pricey. Comes with extra meat and cheese with lettuce and tomato instead of a bun. Perfect for me on my keto diet!'

author: Gabriella Romano
text: 'Good cheese steaks
column5: but they have so much more to offer. Chicken wings are satisfying. The French fries are perfect as well as the onion rings. Do yourself a favor and try the Texas pedal sauce with your sides'

author: SHRIPAL TOLIA
text: 'Excellent quick food and best of service'

author: Tambe Barsbay
text: 'Really good food. Delivery is super fast too
column5: and the food arrives hot still.'

author: Thomas Cook
text: "If you're ordering on a weekend don't expect to have it delivered within two hours. They suck at delivering on time. Get cluck u instead it's just as unhealthy lol"

author: Corey Hoey
text: '2 hours for delivery is unacceptable'

author: Nadir Johnson
text:
"not a fan of their customer service...

1. The person who took the order had a attitude saying they couldn't hear me.

2. He never asked for my phone number just name
column5: address and payment info.\n\n3. Delivery person also had a attitude saying I should have given my phone number if he had to contact me. Granted I had my food delivered to the same address a couple months back. The delivery person said no I didn't because they don't deliver to my area."

author: Feras Sisi
text: 'Amazing philly steak. And great staff.'

author: Robert Beddoe
text: 'Pleasant prompt service. Good food.'

author: Andrew G
text:
'(Translated by Google) Meh.

(Original)
Meh.'

author: Tommy Osterman
text: 'Great service
column5: late night staff is always super friendly
column6: food is pretty good

author: Pallav Patel
text: 'Awesome place. Best food. :-)'

author: anabel borbon
text: 'The steak was great!  The place though was a bit small.'

author: Ben Hammond
text: 'Very excellent cheese-steaks and always fresh fries.'

author: Melanie Tam
text: "I ordered from Midtown Philly after a late night out because I was craving a philly and it was one of the only places open at that hour
column5: which served one. I ordered a chipotle philly and to meet my minimum
column6: I opted for a side of cajun fries. I don't know if the quality has gone up since the last time I ordered
column7: or if not a lot of people order at that time so they just put in more effort
column8: but I really enjoyed it! I especially loved the Cajun fries because even after 30 minutes + of delivery time
column9: they were still hot and crispy
column10: which is pretty impressive. I might need to pop in for an actual visit next time. This way
column12: and I won't have pay that pesky little $3 delivery fee
column13:
Quinn Kerrigan, 5 years ago, 5, 'I come here very often in between classes or after the gym for a quick bite to eat. Service is always fast and easy. Food is great, menu is big enough that I came here almost everyday for a month and never got tired of the food. The employees are always very nice, great atmosphere!'
Syon Rihaan, 5 years ago, 5, ''
Yoel Reina, 5 years ago, 5, I've been ordering from here for quite some time. Today however there was an issue with the delivery of our food and the owner of Midtown P.Steak worked very well with fixing all the issues we ran into tonight. The food here is excellent and I never thought about what customer service was like at M.P.S.
column14: after speaking with the owner ship it's definitely a 10/10 customer service approach. Thanks to all for fixing the issue tonight and the great food!"

author: Jeffrey D. Hoff
text: 'Greasy and expensive for what you get.'

author: f nappologe
text: "We had the original Philly steak and the pizza one
column5: both very very delicious
column6: but you can't eat more than 3/4 of the sandwich as a German that is not used to  such meaty-cheesy-wonder-thing. When you're in Hoboken. Try it. It's great."

author: Justin
text: 'Closest thing to a real Philly in Hoboken.'

author: Oscar Lopez
text: 'Best food in Hoboken! Place is clean and feels like home.'

author: Sarah Lim
text: 'I ordered a philly steak & sweet potato fries for delivery via Yelp. I normally don\'t like philly steaks but thought the cherry peppers and grilled pineapple sounded good so I got that. The delivery took 1 hr. I sat down to finally eat
column5: but no cherry peppers & just small unripened pineapple pieces not even cooked. Next
column6: the sweet potato fries were all soggy and gross. I figured ordering fries for delivery in the first place was my fault. But I was not happy about the philly steak so I called. They put me on hold. I called again. They put me on hold. I called with a different phone. They finally answered. They said they\'d send a new one. I waited 45mins as they told me. I called back. They said "it was on the way". I called again after tired of waiting more. They said "there were other orders but it was on the way". I finally got my food well after 2 hours or so
column7: very late at night. I did not even end up eating it. They probably spit in it anyway. They\'re just VERYYYY RUDE people there! Very disappointed with their childish disrespectful treatment to a customer!'

author: Majestic Lytle
text: 'Originally from Philly and this is the only "Philly Cheesesteak" that I will eat out side of Philly.'

author: Janella Rodriguez
text: "Best cheesesteak I've ever had and the cheese fries were really good and fresh as well nom nom nom"

author: Matthew Goczalk
text: 'Great fries and selection of cheesesteaks.'

author: J. Antonio H (Tony)
text: 'Juicy steak sandwiches'

author: Matthew Halper
text: 'BEST late night food spot. Never had it sober
column5: but it beats out all other late night food.'
